definition: Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: This is direct evidence that was used against the Nazis during the Nuremburg Trials.
sentences.chinese: 這是直接的證據表明，被用來反對納粹的紐倫堡審判。

sentences.english: From there I went straight to Nurnberg.
sentences.chinese: 然後我直接來到紐倫堡。

sentences.english: Field Marshal Keitel described her appearance during an interrogation at Nuremberg.
sentences.chinese: 在紐倫堡一次提審時，凱特爾元帥描述了她的形象。

sentences.english: I was impressed with Thailand's presence at the Nuremberg Toy Fair.
sentences.chinese: 泰國在紐倫堡玩具展上的表現令人印象深刻。

sentences.english: An antique steam locomotive has been displaying at Nürnberg Eisenbahn Museum.
sentences.chinese: 展示於德國紐倫堡鐵路博物館中的古董蒸汽機車。

sentences.english: Their testimony paved the way to Nuremberg.
sentences.chinese: 他們的證詞鋪平了紐倫堡審判之路。

sentences.english: Ernst: The International Toy Fair 2020 will have a product profile adapted to the demand.
sentences.chinese: 2020年紐倫堡玩具展覽將有產品簡介適應需求。

sentences.english: In the autumn people would buy gingerbread hearts in Nuremburg at the Christmas market.
sentences.chinese: 人們會在秋天時到紐倫堡的耶誕市集買心型薑餅。

sentences.english: The exercise of justice at Nuremberg reverberates across this century.
sentences.chinese: 紐倫堡的審判迴盪在整個世紀。

sentences.english: There’s a huge Christmas markets in Nuremberg, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 例如，紐倫堡就有個大型的聖誕市場。

sentences.english: To clear ground, the Nuremberg streetcar depot had to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 要想廓清場地，紐倫堡電車總站必須遷移。

sentences.english: A wall separates the old section of Nuremberg from the new.
sentences.chinese: 在紐倫堡，新城區和舊城區是分離的。

sentences.english: A city of east-central Germany northeast of Nuremberg.
sentences.chinese: 德國中東部一城市，位於紐倫堡東北部。

sentences.english: After the war Hess was tried at Nuremberg and jailed for life.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，他在紐倫堡受審，被判終身監禁。

definition: Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
